meanings.definition: The act of performing more than is required or expected.
meanings.sent1: Her numerous supererogations in volunteering at the shelter impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's supererogations in helping students with extra assignments were greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent3: His supererogations in bringing homemade cookies to every meeting became a running joke among his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The team's supererogations in going above and beyond expectations led them to victory.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's supererogations in saving not only the city but also the neighboring towns made him a legend.

meanings.definition: Excessive or unnecessary actions beyond what is necessary.
meanings.sent1: She found his supererogations efforts to impress her with expensive gifts uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The supererogations decorations at the party made it feel over-the-top and extravagant.
meanings.sent3: The supererogations amount of toppings on the pizza made it impossible to eat without making a mess.
meanings.sent4: His supererogations spending on luxury items left him in financial trouble.
meanings.sent5: The supererogations use of bright colors in the painting made it stand out in the gallery.
